title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
description: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' feature does not always work as expected.
OB: After selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, not all opened files are closed.
EB: After selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all opened files should be closed.
SR:
1. Open multiple files in the application.
2. Select 'Close All Saved' from the File menu.
